entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
